p.style: line-height: 1.7em; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); background-color: rgb(248, 248, 248); text-align: left;
line-height: 1.7em; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); background-color: rgb(248, 248, 248);

nav.div: Warren County R-III School District » Family Resources » COVID-19 School Closure Information

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 34, 40);

p.span: Dear Warren County R-III families and staff,

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: In collaboration with the Warren County Health Department and the Warren County Presiding Commissioner, the Warren County R-III School District has accepted the recommendation to close school for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. All classes and all activities will be canceled through May 22.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: At this time, we do plan to have graduation for our high school seniors as scheduled on May 30.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: Students can pick up their medication, books, Chromebooks, and personal items on Tuesday and Wednesday of next week during regular school hours.

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Any school materials, books, Chromebooks, etc. will need to be returned to school the week of May 19.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: In an effort to continue learning opportunities, our teachers will send out weekly emails informing you of what content would normally be covered that week in their class. These are not homework assignments and will not be taken for a grade. These are learning opportunities for those that wish to continue the education process at home. Summer School registration remains open via our website, and those needing to register for kindergarten can do so this summer or email

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: All grades that appear on transcripts for this semester will be issued as pass/fail. Students with concerns about their current grade in any given class are asked to contact their teacher via email.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 34, 40);

p.span: We will have breakfast and lunch available for pickup on Tuesdays and Thursdays between 11:00 a.m. - 1:00 p.m. behind the Daniel Boone Elementary cafeteria for anyone in the community 18 and under starting March 24 through May 21 - free of charge. These packaged meals will include two days worth of breakfast and two days worth of lunch

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: . If you are unable to drive up to the school, please call and we will make arrangements with you. We have partnered with Agape to help deliver meals to children if necessary.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: During this time, Central Office will remain open Monday through Friday to receive phone calls and provide essential services. We ask that anyone who needs to do business with the district do so via phone if at all possible during those hours. The number to reach Central Office is 636-456-6901. All other district buildings will be closed.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: Anyone who has a reservation to rent our facilities will receive a refund for missed dates, and if reserved through Facilitron you will receive notification on how to proceed.

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: A waiver request regarding makeup days has been submitted to the Department of Elementary and Secondary Education. We will pass along additional information on this when it becomes available.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 34, 40);

p.span: The decision to close our school district was extremely difficult and made out of an abundance of caution for our community. We know closing our schools will have a significant impact on our families, but we also believe that strong, urgent action must be taken to prevent the spread of this virus and to protect lives. As we all endure the coronavirus pandemic, please know that the Warren County R-III School District cares about the well-being of your children. If there is anything the district can help with, please reach out.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 34, 40);

p.span: Thank you for your patience and understanding as we move through this difficult time.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 34, 40);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 34, 40);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 34, 40);

p.span: Superintendent, Warren County R-III School District

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(29, 34, 40);

ul.li: 385 West Veterans Memorial Drive, Warrenton, MO 63383
